title: New W Varus (Skins etc,)
body:
Ok, so the first thing i see is this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IKygV9p01hQ ( 3:13 for me, but mostly all of skins have a great sound effect ) then i'm seeing this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dnv-XpzTwz8&t=1s around 1:40 or so (Should be the same for all other skins).

Mind if i ask , why the best sound in this goddam game was removed from him? Or is it the video not showing it or maybe it's coming back with a lower volume or maybe it was making enemies try to dodge hes empowered Q? anyway that's the best sound effect i heard in years (Not really, i still love Rhast Transformation for Kayn, and so on). Please bring it back, as it's amazing. Not just completely remove it.

replies.body:
Hey, 
With the new Varus W change, it looks like some audio was changed too, albeit intentional or not. I've passed this along to one of our Skins sound designers and he's going to take a look and see what's going on and what should be intended in this case.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YqJIbEOk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-16T20:41:44.455+0000)
>
> Hey, 
> With the new Varus W change, it looks like some audio was changed too, albeit intentional or not. I've passed this along to one of our Skins sound designers and he's going to take a look and see what's going on and what should be intended in this case.

Hope it's just an error of some sorts, since i'm the kind of guy that likes the Art/Audio in-game witch define a champion. If that comes into the game, that's what Varus should be known for. And "gameplay balance" as it gives enemies a warning, witch it's nice.

> [{quoted}](name=ISmurfy420,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YqJIbEOk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-16T21:23:23.722+0000)
>
> Hope it's just an error of some sorts, since i'm the kind of guy that likes the Art/Audio in-game witch define a champion. If that comes into the game, that's what Varus should be known for. And "gameplay balance" as it gives enemies a warning, witch it's nice.

For sure, I agree. ^^ I spoke with Riot Zimberfly, who's a sound designer on skins and he said that it was due to the gameplay changes, but he got a fix in for it! Since we're close to shipping 8.8, it won't be fixed in time for that patch, but will be fixed for 8.9, and should be hitting PBE a bit later this week. Thanks for the call out. :)
